public_index.description: Build modern applications with wleci-core. A powerful, developer-first backend platform that scales with your needs. Real-time databases, authentication, and cloud functions - all in one place.

register.welcome_description: Thousands of developers are already building with wleci-core. Join the community creating the next generation of applications.

unauthorized.heading: Unauthorized
unauthorized.description: You need to sign in to access this page.

forbidden.heading: Access Forbidden
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to view this page. Contact your administrator if you think this is an error.

not_found.heading: Page Not Found
not_found.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

internal_server_error.heading: Server Error
internal_server_error.description: An unexpected server error occurred. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve the issue.
internal_server_error.contact_info: If the problem persists, please contact our support team

maintenance.heading: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.description: We're currently performing maintenance to improve our services. The service will be unavailable for a short time.
maintenance.contact_text: For urgent matters, please contact us:

login.welcome_description: Sign in to your account and continue building amazing applications with the most powerful backend platform.
